alert.note: Alert for San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:16PM CDT until June 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MCCULLOCH...NORTHEASTERN MASON AND SOUTHWESTERN SAN SABA COUNTIES... At 514 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fredonia, moving southeast at 20 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR EXTREME SOUTHEAST MCCULLOCH AND SOUTHWEST SAN SABA COUNTIES. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Pontotoc around 535 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
